ygData.subject: RE: MASK of the deciver
ygData.msgSnippet: ready for some cool info? /st unsticks/stops any song you are playing =) Shada D ukal, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 Paladin, Mithaniel
ygData.messageBody:
ready for some cool info?

/st

unsticks/stops any song you are playing =)

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr



> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Thu, Aug 26/99, Arwen <arwen@...> wrote:
>
> >... A warning on the mask though. If the
> > illusion fails while you are singing ( it lasts approx 15
> minutes before
> > saying your about to look like yourself again) what ever
> song you were
> > singing will be jammed. I have only been able to unjam it
> by camping or
> > zoning.
>
> Actually rapidly hitting 2 or 3 of your hotkeyed songs really quickly
> will also break the lock.
